timeline.bodyText:
This try-catch is not doing anything.
Is it not necessary to cleanup the failed import on exception?
timeline.author: dennisguse

replies.bodyText: The cleanImport needs the track id but if findAndParseKmlFile fails then trackId is not known (now the track is created after import is finishes).
replies.author: rgmf

replies.bodyText: Then we still don't need to catch the exception and throw the same one - so we can remove this try catch, right?
replies.author: dennisguse

timeline.bodyText:
I guess this should not happen.
We could improve this by making findAndParseKmlFile to always throw an exception if it would not return a trackId.
timeline.author: dennisguse

replies.bodyText: What exception should it throw if not trackId won't be returned? RuntimeException?
replies.author: rgmf

timeline.bodyText: fileNameUri should be @nonnull and the null check should be done by the caller (if needed).
timeline.author: dennisguse
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -289,6 +289,30 @@ public static File getPhotoFileIfExists(Context context, Track.Id trackId, Uri u
         return file;
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Builds interval photo file object for fileNameUri Uri.
+     *
+     * @param context     the Context.
+     * @param trackId     the id of the Track.
+     * @param fileNameUri the file name uri.
+     * @return            file object or null.
+     */
+    public static File buildInternalPhotoFile(Context context, Track.Id trackId, Uri fileNameUri) {

timeline.bodyText: Attribute must be removed completely (it is always null) and we have an if (importTrackId == null) on this class.
timeline.author: dennisguse

timeline.bodyText:
@dennisguse I've removed this but I don't understand... If you selected all markers (markerIds.length == viewBinding.markerList.getCount()) then markerIds was set to null and no deletion was do.
Is there something I don't get here?
timeline.author: rgmf

replies.bodyText:
markerIds must be null, so that DeleteMarkerDialogFragment will show the "delete all message".
Don't know if the current is code is working without this if - markerIds might be an initialized array with length=0.
And then the deletion will not happen anymore.
replies.author: dennisguse
rgmf

replies.bodyText: In my last commit is my proposal (it can be undo :D)
replies.author: rgmf

timeline.message:
Marker Bugfixes: markers deletion didn't work and track import didn't include marker's photos. Fixes #514.
Marker edition bugfixed: orphan photos are deleted.

Marker Bugfixes: markers deletion didn't work and track import didn't include marker's photos. Fixes #514.
Marker edition bugfixed: orphan photos are deleted.
